messages.msgSnippet: ... And I can cook too without burning things too often! ;-) Glad you guys like it :-) Joyce [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messages.messageBody:

> That thanks goes to Joyce Fetteroll, amazing writer, incredibly

> thinker and all around groovy chick.

And I can cook too without burning things too often! ;-)

Glad you guys like it :-)

Joyce

messages.subject: Posted at UD  "Joyfully Rejoycing"
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra Dodd posted this message at the UnschoolingDiscussion list yesterday. ______________________________________________________________________
messages.messageBody:
Sandra Dodd posted this message at the UnschoolingDiscussion list
yesterday.
______________________________________________________________________

http://home.earthlink.net/~fetteroll/rejoycing/

Joyce Fetteroll has created a well-organized (naturally) and clear set of

responses to an assortment of questions and arguments over the past few
years,
and made them available. Please save this link and put it where you
can find
it when people want to read (or argue about) unschooling.

Pages like this will make lists like this obsolete, but honestly that
wouldn't be such a bad thing.

The sections are
Unschooling
Learning
Deschooling
School Subjects
Math
Reading
History
Video Games
Television
Doubters and Reluctance
Socialization
Parenting
Respect
Chores
Food
Influencing child behavior
Commitment, obligations, responsibilities
No More Spanking

It's a beautifully conceived and efficient site. Joyce might be too shy
to
promote it here, but I'm not!

Sandra
